posts.postText:
So me and punked were in this other ttt serv.

They had something called pain station for traitors, basically its a health station, that takes away 50 hp per time used, never runs out.

I thought maybe you could add that, But it also heals traitors.
So, heals traitors, and basically anyone who actually needs health will be killed when they use it?
I like this idea. I think 50 hp is a little much. 33?
